message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $110?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit
I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $102?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm willing to make one more concession. How about $108?
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $106?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $110, that's my minimum price. I think it's a fair price considering the value the product brings
